code: import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/core/styles';var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{/* for each select */select:{padding:theme.spacing(2.5),border:"1px solid ".concat(theme.palette.border.main),borderRadius:'0.1875rem',fontSize:'0.75rem',height:'2.75rem'},opt:{marginBottom:theme.spacing(1),marginLeft:theme.spacing(0.2),marginRight:theme.spacing(0.2),paddingLeft:theme.spacing(1),borderRadius:'0.0625rem','&:hover':{background:theme.palette.background.default}},formControl:{margin:theme.spacing(1),maxWidth:'7.5rem'}};});export default useStyles;
